OWASP.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https://*.fontawesome.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://ssl.google-analytics.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' http://www.w3.org/2000/svg https://*.fontawesome.com https://fonts.googleapis.com/ https://www.gstatic.com/ https://www.google.com/recaptcha/ https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js https://www.googletagmanager.com/ https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'  https://*.fontawesome.com https://fonts.googleapis.com/ https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' http://www.w3.org/2000/svg https://resources.ssmhealth.com https://ssl.google-analytics.com data:; frame-src 'self' https://www.google.com/; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://*.fontawesome.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; frame-ancestors 'self' X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
OWASP.Feature-Policy: accelerometer 'none'; camera 'none'; geolocation 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; magnetometer 'none'; microphone 'none'; payment 'none'; usb 'none'
